review: Small, easy to set up & navigate. Easy to set up mirroring as well. Ordered & received same day :)
author: RBowie

review: These are surprisingly useful, especially with televisions of a certain age.After first getting the Fire TV box and quite liking it overall I now have these scattered about and use them more than the Chromecast.Amazon has apps for all of the streaming services we care for and the little remote is easier to use than any app.Also, the Fire TV Stick and its remote are 100% "Gary Busey" free, in case that matters.
author: Amazon Customer "nerd, geek"

review: do not buy waste of money . bought it indecember it stopped working in march
